alert.note: Alert for Halifax; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 21 at 3:38AM EST until further notice by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Carolina... Neuse River At Smithfield affecting Johnston County. Lower Roanoke River At Roanoke Rapids affecting Northampton and Halifax Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lower Roanoke River at Roanoke Rapids. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. Farmlands and timberlands adjacent to the river in Roanoke Rapids flood. Property on the farmlands may be at risk from floodwaters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM EST Sunday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:15 AM EST Sunday was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 9.3 feet. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Thu Lower Roanoke River Roanoke Rapids 9.0 9.3 Sun 3 am EST 9.3 9.3 9.3 9.3 &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rah/rivers. The next statement will be issued by this morning at 1100 AM EST.
